forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
